description: Example Mapping for e-commerce discount code feature

inputs.userStory: As a customer, I want to apply discount codes at checkout, so that I can save money on my purchase

rules: Valid codes reduce order total by code percentage or fixed amount
Expired codes are rejected with error message
Invalid code format shows validation error
Code usage limits enforced (per user, per campaign)
Free shipping codes reduce shipping to $0
exampleScenarios: Apply 20% off code to $100 order → $80 total
Try to stack two codes → error, keep first code
Apply code below minimum order → error message
Apply code with mixed case → works correctly
Apply code at usage limit → error message
questions: What happens if discount brings total below $0?
Do codes apply to shipping costs?
Can codes be used with sale items?
How do we handle codes during refunds?
What's the priority if multiple promotional rules apply?
